Description.Name: Rising Dread
Description.Details: The transmission from Arelle Jorgensson ends with a hard cut. No thank you, no farewell. Just silence—and the faint hum of the Argo’s systems. Darius exhales through his nose, arms crossed. “This is spiraling. Fast. We’re talking coordinated strikes against a rogue Clan... and she expects us to be the tip of the spear?” Sumire leans against the console, glancing toward the viewport. “And if we say no? What happens then? She doesn’t strike me as the ‘let bygones be bygones’ type.” Yang grunts. “The [[DM.Factions[faction_GhostBearWatch],Ghost Bear Watch]] doesn’t leave debts unsettled. And she sees this whole thing as a matter of blood and honor. If we bail now, we don’t just walk—we run. And we keep running.” Farah taps her datapad with restless fingers. “We’re in deeper than salvage and payouts now. This is something else. Old ghosts. Buried wars. And one misstep could light the whole thing off.” No one speaks for a long moment. Eventually, all eyes shift to you, the commander. Darius speaks again, voice low. “Look... you’ve gotten us through worse than this. We trust you, {COMMANDER.CallSign}. Just tell us where we’re going.” Whatever comes next—strike deep or vanish into the black—they’ll follow. But the weight of that choice presses heavier than ever.

Description.Name: Process what has happened so far
Process what has happened so far
Description.Details:
<color=#BFBFBF>The crew is shaken. The [[DM.Factions[faction_MinnesotaTribe],Minnesota Tribe]] is real. And worse—they’re preparing for something big.

But you’re not ready to face it head-on. Not yet.

For now, you’ll drift back toward familiar systems in the periphery. Pick up contracts. Let combat clear the mind while you wait for Jorgensson’s next move.

Focus on what you can control. The rest will come. You have a month of freedom left.</color>
